name: Introduction to Political Science
description: This course provides a broad overview of the field of political science, covering concepts such as democracy, power, and governance.

name: Political Methodology
description: This course introduces students to the methodological techniques used in the field of political science, including quantitative and qualitative analysis.

name: Research Design & Statistics in Political Science
description: This course provides an introduction to research design and statistical techniques used in the field of political science.

name: Advanced Political Methodology
description: This course provides an advanced overview of methodological techniques used in the field of political science, including more advanced quantitative and qualitative analysis.
prerequisites: Research Design & Statistics in Political Science
